## CirclePointsMaterialParameters interface

Parameters used when constructing a new \[\[HighPrecisionPointMaterial\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CirclePointsMaterialParameters extends THREE.ShaderMaterialParameters 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color](./harp-materials.circlepointsmaterialparameters.color.md) | THREE.Color | Point color. |
|  [size](./harp-materials.circlepointsmaterialparameters.size.md) | number | Point size. |
